Texts.Eng: Before we can do anything elsse, we need ^orange;<item>^white;. Floran knowss that ^orange;<target>^white; will let Floran borrow <target.pronoun.possessive>. ^green;Will you go get it?

Texts.Eng: First things first, you'll need to ^green;speak to ^orange;<target> ^white;and ^green;borrow <target.pronoun.possessiveDet> ^orange;<item>. ^white;Just tell <target.pronoun.object> I sent you, and <target.pronoun.subject>'ll be happy to lend it to you.

Texts.Eng: Great! <target> sure is a generous neighbour.

Texts.Eng: Great! that's just what we need. I knew <target> would come through for us! Just don't do something silly like forget to hand it back to <target.pronoun.object> when we're done here. That'd be pretty embarrassing!
Texts.Rus: Отлично! Как раз то что нужно. Я знал, что <target> поможет нам! Просто надо будет не забыть помочь <target.pronoun.object> в ответ, как только мы закончим. А то может получиться весьма неловко!

Texts.Eng: Great, you got it! Let's hope <target> understandss Floran's meaning of borrow...

Почему бы тебе ^green;не сходить и  не попросить <target.pronoun.object>одолжить нам <item.accusative> на неопределённое время?^white; На самом деле, лучше не говори про неопределённое время...

Texts.Eng: John Smith
Texts.Rus: Джон Смит

Texts.Eng: Next, we need a shiny ^orange;<item>^white;. Floran sssaw ^orange;<target>^white; with one, ^green;you should asssk to borrow it.

Texts.Eng: Now we need to find ourselves one ^orange;<item>. ^white;You should ^green;go and ask ^orange;<target>^green; if we can borrow <target.pronoun.possessive>. ^white;No need to mention that we won't be able to return it.

Texts.Eng: Our first priority should be obtaining a good quality ^orange;<item>. I think it's quicker to just^green; ask ^orange;<target>^green; if we can borrow <target.pronoun.possessive>.

Texts.Eng: That went smoothly. Let's hope <target> doesn't ask for it back.

Texts.Eng: That's a decent <item>. Let's hope <target> won't miss it.

Texts.Eng: This <item> will work perfectly! <target> saved us tracking one down ourselves. Make sure you don't damage it, <target.pronoun.subject> wouldn't be happy if you returned it in poor condition.

Texts.Eng: Thiss is a very good <item>! Floran surprised that <target> gave it up so easssily. Maybe we won't give it back so ssoon.
Texts.Rus: <item>! Очень хорошшо! Флоран удивлён, что <target> так просссто отдал<target.pronoun.verbEnding> тебе такую ценность. Может быть мы не вернём её вссскоре.

Texts.Eng: Well done! We probably won't be able to return this <item> to <target>, but I'm sure <target.pronoun.subject> won't miss this dusty old thing anyway.

Texts.Eng: You got it! Floran thinksss we'll need <item> a little longer than <target> may like. But let'ss worry about that later.
